pr_title: Resolves #794: FDBRecordStore.rebuildIndexWithNoRecord should clear and mark readable and not just assume that the subspace is empty

timeline.bodyText: Possibly either .thenRun or .thenAccept instead of .thenApply. It doesn't really matter, though; just style.
timeline.author: alecgrieser

timeline.message: Resolves #794: FDBRecordStore.rebuildIndexWithNoRecord should clear and mark readable and not just assume that the subspace is empty
